codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

codeSystems.name: IheToDoLaughing
codeSystems.title: The positions during laughing
codeSystems.description: These are the body positions that IHE ToDo laughing. The valueset is not a good one as it is being used in BodySite but it is not the site on the body but the position of the body... but this is just for fun.
